name: Pakin Kajonsuksanti
about: Hi, I’m Deon — a student pursuing a degree in Cybersecurity and Computer Information Systems. I love coding, building tools that make life easier, and contributing to my community. Outside of tech, I do voice acting as a hobby and dabble in graphic design and 3D modeling.

projects.title: Software Development (Primary: Java)
projects.desc: Creative Software Development — Passion for designing and building unique programs from the ground up. I enjoy turning ideas into functional tools with a personal touch, blending creativity with solid coding practices.

projects.title: Individual / Team Development
projects.desc: Designed and managed server systems; created custom games both individually and collaboratively with a large group, occasionally assisting in project leadership with other creators and developers — particularly within Minecraft-based projects.

projects.title: Interdepartmental Support and Service
projects.desc: Provided customer support with a focus on problem solving and effective communication between departments to ensure smooth operations and client satisfaction.
